name: easy breezy ribbed beanie
notes:
*please note this is the ad-free, easy to print version of this pattern. you can find the free version on my blog www.theturtletrunk.com

this pattern is beginner friendly and easily adjustable to make it perfect for you!
the pattern can be made either slouchy or standard fit and includes sizes for all heads!
the ribbed texture is simple, modern, and perfect for the cooler seasons.
add a pom pom for some extra fun and i promise everyone will be asking you to make them one!

pattern includes:
-detailed instructions in 8 sizes (newborn-adult large)
-photos for reference
-adjustment suggestions to make standard fit or slouchy fit
-link to video tutorial

difficulty: easy

yarn used: medium weight

hook size: i / 5.5 mm

standard us crochet terms

pattern includes 8 sizes: 0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 1-3 years, 3-10 years, adult small, adult medium, and adult large.
